professional_summary: Aircraft Mechanic/Database Administrator with expertise in helicopter maintenance and database administration, experienced in technical documentation, troubleshooting, and sales. Holds FAA Airframe and Powerplant certification.

work_experience.company: US Army National Guard - Salt Lake City, UT
key_responsibilities: Repair Blackhawk/Apache/Lakota helicopters and perform final airworthiness inspections.
Use appropriate technical manuals to assist in proper maintenance practices and document work completed in logbooks.
Maintain customer relationships and follow up with previous customers to learn about vehicle status for potential sales.
